name: Best Motion Picture of the Year
Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role
nominees: Leonardo DiCaprio for The Wolf of Wall Street
Chiwetel Ejiofor for 12 Years a Slave
Matthew McConaughey for Dallas Buyers Club

name: Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role
nominees: Meryl Streep for August: Osage County

name: Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role
nominees: Jonah Hill for The Wolf of Wall Street
Michael Fassbender for 12 Years a Slave
Jared Leto for Dallas Buyers Club

name: Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role
nominees: Julia Roberts for August: Osage County
Lupita Nyong'o for 12 Years a Slave

name: Best Achievement in Directing
nominees: Steve McQueen for 12 Years a Slave
David O. Russell for American Hustle

name: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
nominees: American Hustle: Eric Warren Singer, David O. Russell
Dallas Buyers Club: Craig Borten, Melisa Wallack

name: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
nominees: The Wolf of Wall Street: Terence Winter

name: Best Animated Feature Film of the Year
Best Foreign Language Film of the Year
nominees: The Broken Circle Breakdown: Felix Van Groeningen(Belgium)
